attributes.review: I got this app but after waiting for hours for it to download they got off to a bad start, not only that they asked for my phone number then wouldn’t stop spamming me with texts and emails. Don’t recommend for busy people 👎:(
attributes.title: Uh no ❤️

attributes.review:

attributes.title: chile

attributes.review: i really wanted this app cause i wanted to catch up on everything but as soon had i got the app pop ups started to show up it was so scary i was being harassed by trumps pop ups they showed me unbelievable things racist images i was shocked i quickly deleted the app and now my phone is glitching uncontrollably and i think they have all my information and scared of what they are gonna do with it don’t download this terrible terrible app
attributes.title: what an awfulllll app

attributes.review: every time I open it, it crashes🤢my friends saw it on my phone and they all laughed at me and called me a stupid lil bunker baby😭😭😭😭and the worst part is, the app is very boring and POINTLESS so it was all for nothing😪I’m sad now😢
attributes.title: this app lags and now all my friends hate me

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what the fuss was about then out of nowhere I saw writing on my wall and it said black lives don’t matter I was scared out of my mind apple please delete this app idrc about tik tok being deleted just please delete it
attributes.title: This app is possessed

attributes.review: This app is terrible, I downloaded it and it just would not open. Every time I attempted to use it the app crashed not only itself but also my whole phone as well.
attributes.title: Expected better

attributes.review: This app causes my phone to freeze up. I have had to restart my phone several times. I didn’t have this issue until after I downloaded this app.
attributes.title: To many bugs
